pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python version of MoorDyn, a lumped-mass mooring dynamics modelintended for coupling with floating structure codes.This is not a wrapper of MoorDyn, but an stand-alone version. Thus you canjust install and use this package, no need of the MoorDyn library in yoursystem.Please, visit https://moordyn-v2.readthedocs.io to learn more about this package,and MoorDyn in general.If you detect any problem, please feel free to report the issue on the GitHubpage:https://github.com/mattEhall/MoorDynWARNING: This is a pre-release version of MoorDyn v2. The API may be changedin the future, breaking your program
